name: Save The Planet (Robert Orange)
description:
A game about a robot that tries to save the Earth by planting trees in a future where it has become an irradiated wasteland.

Collect trash and convert it to trees while defending your saplings from corrupt robots to restore the planet. 

Exiting grassy areas will expose you to radiation and you'll start to take damage! Plant new trees to remove radiation from areas.

Move with WASD - Tank Controls

You can plant new trees when you're in a grassy area, you have 3 trash and hold the spacebar.

Click on corrupt robots to throw trash at them and scare them away!

Credits

Game Design, Programming, Character Art - Robert Orange (@ROSpiceLord)
